definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Pr 8:10 gold, poet. (Ph. [[חרץ]], v. Dr:Sm xxviii; As. ḫurâṣu)—[[חָרוּץ]] Ps 68:14 + 5 t.; gold, always ‖[[כֶּסֶף]]; Zec 9:3, of dove's wings Ps 68:14 ´[[בִּירַקְרַק ח]]; elsewh. in comparison with value of wisdom, etc. Pr 3:14, Pr 8:10 ([[נִבְחָר]] ´[[ח]]) v:Pr 8:19, Pr 16:16.
